# OISST

## NOAA's Optimal Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature

Intro text/background

## Creates new slide

The data are saved as a `tibble` in `pacea`:
```{r oisstdata}
hake_biomass
```

## Help file
```{r oissthelp, eval=FALSE}
?oisst_month
```

## New slide

```{r oisstplot}
plot(hake_biomass)
```
